version_description:
Yoooooooooo. Get ready for the "Wu Tang" version. We've been working hard to allow you to personalize your Cizoo:

- Add new audio effects to your voice ! We call them Voice Mask. You can now sound like a Priest, a Caveman, a Robot or an Astronaut.<
F O L L O W  Y O U R  F A V O R I T E  P R O F I L E S  A N D  D I S C O V E R  G R E A T  T A L E N T S  : )  : )

Cardi? Ari? We <3 U both :)
So we solved a lot of bugs for you.

"You can't tell me I ain't flyyyyyyy"

- A lot of new songs on Cizoo
- Your friends do not disappear from your Share screen
- New audio masks sooooon

"I'm the baaaaaaad guy - duh"

A new version with many new stuff to fully express your potential:
- Viewing speed has been dramatically increased in Open Mic
- The audio filters are now more harmonious and beautiful
- Find all the videos li
You can now comment videos juste like in a TV Channel!

Brand new version!!
- A whole set of new audio effects to sound like a pro
- Video filters in HQ
- Better interface

"Doing is one thing. Doing it right is a whole different story." Drake.

You are more and more in the app ! Thank you all !!

- We have added new video filters (including covering filters), give them a try!
- We have fixed so many things in this new version... Many concern bad crashes when starting recording.
You can now use hashtags and mentions in your Cizoos and your comments !

You can now watch the Cizoos of your favorite singers in the following feed. Check it out!
We have also fix some crashes and bugs.

- We made your public profile more attractive
- You can now block a user in order to hide his content (and hide your content from him)
- Bug fixes
Fixes on the new Discover screen.

- Nine new levels to build your singing carrer and to be to the TOP!
- Search Cizoos by your favorite tracks in Discover.

Get coins by completing the Cizoo challenges. Unlock new features :
- Thousands of new songs
- Boost your videos and the ones of your friends thanks to Shoutouts

Stay tuned :)
We made Discover more attractive and more dynamic to watch amazing content.
12 new levels available! Complete levels and become a Cizoo Star.
